name: Hydrology change - Major hydrological changes, e.g. impaired currents or water exchange - pressure layer from the WIO Symphony tool
description: This layer was produced by using manually collected data provided by Be Geospatial AB. The collected points were separated within different coastal features. 5-km buffer zones were used for masking around land reclamation points, sea wall points and water movement change points, then rasterized into a raster and mapped onto the reference grid. Known limitations: The manually corrected data using the sattelite images within the curtain period of time, it could miss out some exist activities within this region and contain data gaps.

citation: Zerne P (2023). Hydrology change - ecosystem component from the WIO Symphony tool. URL: https://github.com/WIOSymphony/
